connectDescription: Ready to command your Volcano? Forge a connection through the ancient arts of Bluetooth.
connectInstruction: Ensure your Volcano burns with power nearby

tips.brightness: Setting brightness to naught extinguishes the light
tips.clean: Keep thy chamber pure as Lothl√≥rien :D
tips.filter: Check thy air filter as one tends the gardens
tips.themes: Change thy realm's appearance in the Hall of Settings
tips.workflows: Use workflows to master the Flame of Anor
tips.temperatures: Add or remove heat levels in the settings forge
tips.bagReplace: Replace thy vapor pouches every fortnight for finest essence
tips.bagTime: Ten minutes or less to preserve the sacred vapors
tips.preheat: Warm the chamber briefly ere the bag joins
tips.dragDrop: Move workflows as Gandalf moves his pieces
tips.highlight: Mark thy last journey with elven light
tips.autoSeasonal: The seasons change thy theme as in Rivendell
tips.newCommands: New powers of command are granted!
tips.miniModeGrid: Without workflows, see the grid of temperatures
tips.tempToggle: Touch the heat runes to switch between realms
tips.translation: These words are wrought by machine-spirits and may lack true wisdom. Seek to add new tongues or better our speech? Send word to me!

contact.title: üí¨ Send a Message
contact.description: Well met! I welcome all messages from fellow travelers. Share thy thoughts freely.
contact.getInTouch: Hail and well met! Connect through social paths or send word directly.
contact.spamNotice: Check thy spam folder, for replies may wander there.
contact.submitWithoutContactBody: No contact runes provided. I cannot send reply scrolls without them.

workflowEditor.title: üî• Forge of Workflows
workflowEditor.description: Create, customize, and command thy vapor rituals. Craft precise heat sequences as the smiths of old.
workflowEditor.createNewDescription: Begin crafting thy rituals from scratch or use ancient templates.
workflowEditor.customWorkflowDescription: Build thy own path with chosen temperatures and timings.
workflowEditor.templatesDescription: Quick rituals passed down by master vapers.
workflowEditor.configEditorDescription: Backup and manage thy ritual scrolls. Export to JSON runes.
workflowEditor.exportDescription: View and modify thy current ritual configuration.
workflowEditor.importDescription: Add new rituals from JSON scrolls shared by others.
workflowEditor.currentConfigDescription: Thy ritual configuration lies below. Copy for safekeeping.
workflowEditor.aboutImportDescription: Import rituals from JSON scrolls shared by fellow travelers.
